text: Ashok H. Desai ( - 13 April 2020) was an Indian politician and lawyer. He was the Attorney General of India from 9 July 1996 to 6 May 1998. He also was the Solicitor General of India from 18 December 1989 to 2 December 1990 . He was awarded the Padma Bhushan." Padma Awards" (PDF). Ministry of Home Affairs, Government of India, 2015. Retrieved 21 July 2015. Desai died on 13 April 2020 at the age of 77.Senior Advocate And Former Attorney General For India Ashok Desai Passes Away ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian lawyers Category:Politicians from Mumbai
title: Ashok Desai
